caption.p: Body size residuals (standard length (mm) corrected for density) of stickleback ( Gasterosteus aculeatus) offspring at 30, 60 and 90d post-hatch in the four maternal acclimation and offspring rearing temperature environments (constant 17 °C; open circles, constant 21 C; closed circles, predictably variable; open triangles, and stochastically variable; closed squares). Points reflect means (±SE) of all families within each maternal-offspring temperature combination; lines join offspring rearing environments.
